location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting invoices and receipts for four cases of shawl cloths supplied to Bruce and being shipped by the East India Company cruiser, Prince of Wales, Captain Lieutenant Arthur. Invoices and receipts are not included.
